selected_quotes: Parasite wasp turns parasitized wasp into zombie, then drills through its head. If you believe in God, explain this.
#GreatAdaptations Some adaptations are creepy: a parasitic wasp parasitizes another parasitic wasp
Newly discovered crypt keeper wasp manipulates its host into making and plugging a hole in a branch, then tunnel…
@petercoffey Since I started working on this AMAZING study system: (also - insects are WAAAY cool and WAAAY easier to work with)
... wasp Euderus set excavate small emergence holes that the host plugs with their head capsule prior to death :o

citation.abstract: There are many examples of apparent manipulation of host phenotype by parasites, yet few examples of hypermanipulation-where a phenotype-manipulating parasite is itself manipulated by a parasite. Moreover, few studies confirm manipulation is occurring by quantifying whether the host's changed phenotype increases parasite fitness. Here we describe a novel case of hypermanipulation, in which the crypt gall wasp Bassettia pallida (a phenotypic manipulator of its tree host) is manipulated by the parasitoid crypt-keeper wasp Euderus set, and show that the host's changed behaviour increases parasitoid fitness. Bassettia pallida parasitizes sand live oaks and induces the formation of a 'crypt' within developing stems. When parasitized by E. set, B. pallida adults excavate an emergence hole in the crypt wall, plug the hole with their head and die. We show experimentally that this phenomenon benefits E. set, as E. set that need to excavate an emergence hole themselves are about three times more likely to die trapped in the crypt. In addition, we discuss museum and field data to explore the distribution of the crypt-keeping phenomena.
citation.journal: Proceedings of the Royal Society B: Biological Sciences
citation.title: Tales from the crypt: a parasitoid manipulates the behaviour of its parasite host

author.name: 怪遊星人
author.description:
趣味はプラモ・ゾイド。お気に入りメカはゴジュラスMK-Ⅱ(量)、フルアーマーガンダム。
色々な人の、様々な創作物を見るのが好きです。製作者のセンスや工夫、思い入れ、思考の跡を空想するとワクワクします。

author.name: GP
author.description:
あんまりツイートしないかもしれない。
ボーダーブレイクでは装甲重視の重火を使ってＡ２から抜け出せない。あ、ちなみにチャロナーです。

author.name: いにゅばな工房
author.description: 毎日たのしく模型を作る。 色んなものを作っていきたいのですが、なかなかガンプラに偏りがちです。 あと自然大好き。湿度がきらい。

author.name: あんとんシュガー
author.description: 単身赴任先の仙台で少し被災しました。あの仙台の雰囲気は一生忘れないでしょう。そして仙台を出ました。日本ナマズとスッポンとドジョウを飼ってます。親父が軍用機の電子機器の技術者だった影響で軍用機ファンです。

author.name: PerPl_Lab
author.description: Perception and Plasticity lab = Kari Hoffman and lab members. Exploration and exploitation in the twittersphere.

author.name: Dan Vahaba 🧠🐦🎶
author.description: bird-brained bird brain researcher with hormones on the mind | phd candidate in neuroscience @umassamherst | curator: @SBNTweets & @HealeyLab

author.name: Dan (((Graur)))
author.description: An evolutionary biologist and art lover. The upside-down flag symbolizes distress due to the illegitimate  installment of a Manchurian candidate as president.

author.name: Bill Needle
author.description: [F]rom so simple a beginning endless forms most beautiful and most wonderful have been, and are being, evolved.”

author.name: the innominate one
author.description: Not safe for work. Actually, not safe for anywhere.

author.name: Stefano Mariani
author.description: Marine ecologist and population geneticist. 8-generation Roman, moved to Britannia like Hadrian. Filius mi quoque Romanus est. Born giallorosso, Red by adoption

author.name: Eckart Stolle
author.description: MarieCuriePostdoc@QMUL, interested in evol genetics, evol/mol ecology, speciation and biodiversity. entomologist for more than 2 decades

author.name: Integrative Biology
author.description: The Department of Integrative Biology at the University of Guelph

author.name: Miles Zhang
author.description: PhD candidate at @UCF, entomologist interested in parasitoid phylogenetics & speciation, nature photography, and heavy metal.  Looking for postdoc early 2018

author.name: Kelly Weinersmith
author.description: Rice University Adjunct & Brachiolope Media Network podcaster who studies parasites, personality, and lots of other awesome stuff. Married to @ZachWeiner.

wikipedia.title: Euderus set
wikipedia.summary: Euderus set, the crypt-keeper wasp, is a chalcid wasp from the family Eulophidae from the south-eastern United States which is a parasitoid of the gall wasp Bassettia pallida.
